ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Jungle Book: Fall of the Wild
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Wedding of King Louis is crashed by a familiar foe while Mowglii and Bomani find themselves fighting side by side for the first and possibly the last time as all of the animal armies collide on the jungle battleflied. Who will survive the Last Animal Battle and will there be an island left to fight for as Kipling's Reach explodes with lava and ash?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Carlos Granda & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Alfredo Reyes & Ylenia Dinapoli | 2 | C | Cover C | Paolo Pantalena (a) & Ula Mos (c) | 3 | D | Cover D | Tina Valentino & Leonardo Paciarotti | 4 | RI | Secret Retailer Incentive Cover | Paolo Pantalena (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing |
